```{python}
#| label: fig-oscillator-lc-pmos
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "An LC differential oscillator using a PMOS cross-coupled differential pair. $L_1$ and $L_2$ are usually implemented as a single on-chip spiral inductor with a center tap."
import schemdraw as sd
import schemdraw.elements as elm
import schemdraw.dsp as dsp

sd.svgconfig.svg2 = False

with sd.Drawing(canvas='svg') as d:
    d.config(unit=2, fontsize=14)

    # Start from VDD at top
    elm.Vdd()
    Ibias = elm.SourceI().down().dot()
    pos_vdd = d.here
    
    # cross-coupled PMOS pair (at top)
    d.push()
    elm.Line().left(d.unit*1.5)
    elm.Line().down(d.unit/4)
    M1 = elm.AnalogPFet(offset_gate=False).label('$M_1$', loc='left').theta(0)
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().right(d.unit*1.5) 
    elm.Line().down(d.unit/4)
    M2 = elm.AnalogPFet(offset_gate=False).label('$M_2$', loc='right').anchor('source').theta(0).reverse()

    # Cross-coupling connections for PMOS
    elm.Line().down(d.unit/4).at(M1.drain).dot()
    d.push()
    l1 = elm.Line().down(d.unit/2).dot()
    d.pop()
    elm.Wire('z').to(M2.gate)

    elm.Line().down(d.unit/4).at(M2.drain).dot()
    d.push()
    l2 = elm.Line().down(d.unit/2).dot()
    d.pop()
    elm.Wire('z').to(M1.gate)

    # LC tank (now at bottom)
    elm.CapacitorVar().at(l1.end).to(l2.end).label('$C$', loc='bottom')
    l3 = elm.Line().down(d.unit).at(l1.end)
    l4 = elm.Line().down(d.unit).at(l2.end)
    elm.Inductor2(loops=2).at(l3.end).tox(pos_vdd).label('$L_1$', loc='top').dot()
    pos_center = d.here
    d.push()
    elm.Ground()
    d.pop()
    elm.Inductor2(loops=2).to(l4.end).label('$L_2$', loc='top')
```
